name: Real Traffic Highway Rush Race
description:
Drive your racing fast speed car in this high addictive racing game. Real ultimate highway rush racer will give thrilling and skilled experience. Traffic highway Rider takes the challenging endless racing gear on to a modern next generation drifting roads. Get an adventure of driving in rushy car. This impossible path give you a stunts challenge to show out your driving racing ability. This game require you an experienced driving challenge. Furious highway fantasy rally to dodge in race. Exhibit your car race drive to get coins after winning the racing battle. Try to be world fastest driver of this game. Defend your title and defeat rivals of this racing war.
Run your car smooth between the traffic and race more but avoid the accident. Limitless rushed traffic game with unlimited racing game. Choose world famous places like mountain, city mountain or jungle environment. Luck is on your side because your car is perfect and high racing with smooth control. Driving on one sided road is easy and you have to dodge your racing rivals. But racing on double traffic roads is double duty game. Double sided road is dangerous where your first job is to avoid accident and second is to defeat other racing cars. Get more coins to unlock new environment and high performance cars / vehicles.
City::
Every one want to drive fast racers car to defeat every one. Tired from slow driving vehicle like truck trailer or other transportation vehicle. So this highway rush in the city driving is superb and addictive.

Desert::
Next mode is the desert tracks race. Desert are more famous for racing rally because there is less rush of people so drive fast as your engine bear so gear on your car to enjoy the race in desert. Improve your expertise of desert drifting and get Gold Coins.

Mountain:: Driving everywhere is tough but driving on the mountain is a killer driving expert challenge. Race the car, climbing mountain and chase destination hill point.
